After the game, the team leader of cloud Gore (Louis van Gaal) made â€‹â€‹the analysis, pointed out numerous reasons for Manchester United.

"I think the most important on the line refers to a Manchester United losing the biggest reason, of course, the players and coaching staff have some responsibility, but I think the biggest problem is the anti-gang Man, I see on the social networking site, they criticize day in Manchester, is the key to Manchester United lose waves! if Manchester United do not like it, please support other teams, why want to hope that Manchester United lost day wave? "cloud Gore bewildered.

"Manchester United have fallen sharply this autumn results, because that class anti Mann's seven day curse Manchester United lost in the wave, and most unfortunately, not even one day have helped bury canal, the Manchester United got hit Link difference. "cloud Gore continued.

When asked about the future of the tactical team countermeasures, cloud Gore called on fans to support the team Manchester United: "I understand the criticism, there is progress, but now Manchester United, really need the support of the fans of each team, in order to re-shock glory! Please stop criticism of Manchester United or curse, and close their relevant special page and website! Manchester United scores the most to the main reason for the decline is the anti-Man who constantly interfere, and if they do not stop the anti-Man action, it would destroy them ! only by doing so can the English Premier League team Manchester United made â€‹â€‹a Fan BIG 4! "
